version_description:
- Optimised for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- Fixed crash on iPod 4th generation
- A whole lot easier to win at the Wheel of Misfortune
- The map is more responsive
- Easier to unlock characters
- Slightly easier to stay on the Dolphin Rodeo
- Add your initials to the leaderboards
- Fixed some issues with Facebook friends leaderboards
- Fixed share image for the Hammer Throw game

+ 10 bonus tokens for you when you update!

Thanks for all your feedback, and thanks for playing Dumb Ways to Die 2.

Always be safe around trains :)

We know you’ve been waiting, and the time has come! Get ready for the fourth and most extreme arena yet...


ADRENALAND

Adrenaland is open for action with eight brand new extreme sports mini-games. New levels include:

Wing Walking
Can you do the mile high moon walk?

Volcano Climbing
Avoid the lava and a tasty thermal BBQ awaits!

Zoo Parkour
Have you got what it takes to be crowned king of the meerkats?

Plus: Anvil Breaking, Risky Ramp Assembly, Unsafe Bungee, Tsunami Surfing and No Parachute Jump!


MULTIPLAYER

Battle stations! Challenge your Facebook friends in the new multiplayer battle mode.

Play 3 rounds of 5 games against your friends. Winner takes all!

Remember to turn on push notifications so we can let you know when it’s your turn.


TEAM LEADERBOARDS

Introducing the Pledge of Allegiance!

Pledge your loyalty to your favourite Dumb Ways character and join their team! Each time you play The Dumbest of the Dumb, your score will contribute to your team’s position on the new global teams leaderboard.

Get your favourite character to the top of the world! Which team will reign supreme?


BUG FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS

• Fixed a bug where the screen became unresponsive after entering your initials
• Fixed accidental Facebook button tap issue when swiping through the arena leaderboards


Thanks for letting us know what you think about Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games! We love your feedback :)

1.2.7

Bug fix for issue with In-App Purchases found in version 1.2.5. If you've made a purchase after updating to 1.2.5 and didn't receive anything, please visit the shop and tap Restore Purchases to get your goodies!

1.2.10

Bug fix for issue resulting in multiplayer scores over 1000 to be cut back to triple digit scores.

Performance improvements.

INTRODUCING CAMP CATASTROPHE

The Dumb Ways world has grown - pack your tent! Eight brand new outdoor themed mini-games await you, including:

Grizzly Bear Salmon Catch
Wrestle salmon from the paws of greedy grizzlies.

Bunyip Kumbaya
Can you keep the beat with your bunyip bandmates?

Volatile Marshmallow Toasting
Mmmm... toast a crispy marshmallow around the campfire. Just don’t burn it :o

Plus: Drop Bear Woodchop, Tree Top Monkey Race, Reckless River Crossing, Fearless Foraging, and Creepy Campfire Lighting!

THE DUMBGEON AWAITS

Sound trumpets! The medieval mini-games have arrived. The Dumbgeon includes eight new games:

Penguin Jousting
Don your helmet and unhorse the dastardly penguin.

The Running of the Plague Rats
Out run the black death! Lovely.

Blind Blacksmithery
Hammers. Swords. Blindfolds.

Plus: Dragon Manicure, Maiden Rescuing, Beast Feasting, Perilous Potion Concoction and Torture Rack Yoga!

Bonus!
Smoother map scrolling

THE DUMBGEON AWAITS

Sound trumpets! The medieval mini-games have arrived. The Dumbgeon includes eight new games:

Penguin Jousting
Don your helmet and unhorse the dastardly penguin.

The Running of the Plague Rats
Out run the black death! Lovely.

Blind Blacksmithery
Hammers. Swords. Blindfolds.

Plus: Dragon Manicure, Maiden Rescuing, Beast Feasting, Perilous Potion Concoction and Torture Rack Yoga!

Bonus!
Smoother map scrolling

WELCOME TO RIO STADIDUMB

Dumb Ways is going to Rio!

Beaches, football, dancing, martial arts… and a brand new character joins the crew! Rio Stadidumb includes:

Capybara Capoeira
Do the ginga with the world’s largest, cutest, and most deadly serious martial rodent.

Complicated Coffee Making
Don your barista moustache and flick the knobs! Can you master the espresso in the land of the coffee bean, or will your eyes melt off your face?

Cocky Carioca
Samba time! But first you’ll need some feathers for your costume, hmmm…

Plus: Tan Line Trauma, Rattle Shake Mistake, Fancy Football Flop, Lost Tribe Discovery and Yeti Waxing*

* Yes there are yetis in Brazil. They’re tourists. They want to look their best for the beach.

And remember, stay safe around toucans.

A new character appears on the map! What's Dunce doing there?

Plus some under the hood improvements and bug fixes for iOS 10.

AREA FIFTYDUMB: DUMB WAYS IN SPACE!

The beans are out of this world and exploring the final dumbtier. Area Fiftydumb includes 8 new mini-games!

Teleportation Tangle
Stupa and Boffo are jumbled in the energy beam! Match the guts to the beans before they rematerialise.

Acid Moon Walk
Selectively apply gravity to avoid the acid bubbles.

Space Monster Midwifery
Deliver the baby aliens! Belly bursting goodness. Naaaaww.

Plus: Alien Wildlife Photography, Interstellar Tea Ceremony, Countdown Commuter, Laser Satellite Reception and Counter Cow Abduction.

Double plus: we've added a new spacey musical theme to the map, optimised map performance on all devices, and fixed some issues with push notifications in the multiplayer arena.

There are now 68 mini-games in Dumb Ways to Die 2! Explore the arenas and play them all :)

Enjoy!

AMERICALAND

We’re celebrating the Fourth of July with a star-spangled makeover!

Adrenaland has been supercharged and spectacularised - welcome to AMERICALAND (all caps experience guaranteed). Plus a new map and new music!

Declare your independence with a month of red white and blue beans, burgers, bald eagles, and shining seas of liberty for all - cue fireworks!

Happy Holidays!!

- General bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!

Have some fun in the Brazilian Sun and shake and Samba your way down to Rio Stadidumb!

Enjoy the very best of the original and famous Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games!
Catch the train around town and check out your favorite stops with all your favorite minigames!

What's New?
- Fixes and adjustments to Score Boost to get you higher scores!

It's shamrock time! Explore the St. Patrick's Day version of Dumbville in Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games!

2x Brand New St Patrick's day themed minigames!
Run on rainbow paths and scrub the gold clean. Do all the fun things when Dumbville's in green!

Including other little bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!

Enjoy the very best of the original and famous Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games!

Travel and explore all of Dumbville through the many towns and even more minigames. Play along and get the highest scores possible for Dumbest of the Dumb carnival tickets, sticker unlocks and more!

What's New?
- Little bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!

Welcome to this very special Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games update!

In honor of Dumb Ways' involvement in 'The Story of the Moving Image' museum at the ACMI Exhibition in Melbourne, Australia, this new update is jam-packed!

Every time you cross the train stations in the middle of the map, play one of two new historic minigames, Fossil Falls or Lightbulb Blunder. YOU get to chose the flyer/brochure and game to play!

Download and play now this limited-time update TODAY!

Welcome to the latest update of Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games!

This month, our resident Dumbville beans are teaching us all about train safety!

Play our brand new minigame Intercom Avoidance today! Do you have what it takes to not press the button?

Enjoy the very best of the original and famous Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games!

Travel around town and explore all of Dumbville's cities and play a huge variety of the famous Dumb Ways minigames today!

What's New?
- Little bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!
